00028 #ifndef __OptimisedUtil_H__
00029 #define __OptimisedUtil_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreEdgeListBuilder.h"
00033 #include <cstddef>
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00047     class _OgreExport OptimisedUtil
00048     {
00049     private:
00051         OptimisedUtil(const OptimisedUtil& rhs); /* do nothing, should not use */
00053         OptimisedUtil& operator=(const OptimisedUtil& rhs); /* do not use */
00054 
00055     protected:
00057         static OptimisedUtil* msImplementation;
00058 
00060         static OptimisedUtil* _detectImplementation(void);
00061 
00062     public:
00063         // Default constructor
00064         OptimisedUtil(void) {}
00065         // Destructor
00066         virtual ~OptimisedUtil() {}
00067 
00073         static OptimisedUtil* getImplementation(void) { return msImplementation; }
00074 
00099         virtual void softwareVertexSkinning(
00100             const float *srcPosPtr, float *destPosPtr,
00101             const float *srcNormPtr, float *destNormPtr,
00102             const float *blendWeightPtr, const unsigned char* blendIndexPtr,
00103             const Matrix4* const* blendMatrices,
00104             size_t srcPosStride, size_t destPosStride,
00105             size_t srcNormStride, size_t destNormStride,
00106             size_t blendWeightStride, size_t blendIndexStride,
00107             size_t numWeightsPerVertex,
00108             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00109 
00124         virtual void softwareVertexMorph(
00125             Real t,
00126             const float *srcPos1, const float *srcPos2,
00127             float *dstPos,
00128             size_t pos1VSize, size_t pos2VSize, size_t dstVSize, 
00129             size_t numVertices,
00130             bool morphNormals) = 0;
00131 
00141         virtual void concatenateAffineMatrices(
00142             const Matrix4& baseMatrix,
00143             const Matrix4* srcMatrices,
00144             Matrix4* dstMatrices,
00145             size_t numMatrices) = 0;
00146 
00158         virtual void calculateFaceNormals(
00159             const float *positions,
00160             const EdgeData::Triangle *triangles,
00161             Vector4 *faceNormals,
00162             size_t numTriangles) = 0;
00163 
00180         virtual void calculateLightFacing(
00181             const Vector4& lightPos,
00182             const Vector4* faceNormals,
00183             char* lightFacings,
00184             size_t numFaces) = 0;
00185 
00200         virtual void extrudeVertices(
00201             const Vector4& lightPos,
00202             Real extrudeDist,
00203             const float* srcPositions,
00204             float* destPositions,
00205             size_t numVertices) = 0;
00206     };

00212     template <class T>
00213     static FORCEINLINE T* rawOffsetPointer(T* ptr, ptrdiff_t offset)
00214     {
00215         return (T*)((char*)(ptr) + offset);
00216     }
00217 
00222     template <class T>
00223     static FORCEINLINE void advanceRawPointer(T*& ptr, ptrdiff_t offset)
00224     {
00225         ptr = rawOffsetPointer(ptr, offset);
00226     }
00230 }
